channel.title: VTX:NESN on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in VTX:NESN on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Nestlé Picks Insider to Replace CEO Fired Over Affair
item.description: Nestlé SA is turning to the executive who runs its Nespresso coffee empire to try and steady the world’s largest food business after it was rocked by the second CEO firing in a little over a year.
